name: The Last Leviathan (itch)

---

A tense, DOS-themed dungeon-crawler about mythical abominations, the occult book they wrote, and permanent bleeding.

Created in ~36 hours for Global Game Jam 2020.

An investigator examines an occult book written and smuggled into our world by ancient criminals banished to The Underground. In doing so, the words bring one of those criminals, now a mythical abomination known as The Last Leviathan, back into the physical world.

This starts a race against time, as the investigator must now balance between repairing his body, escaping the monster, and finding the exit from the hellish maze he stumbled into.
